events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Captured at the start of the return process, signifying that a return has been requested by the customer.

events.name: ReturnRejected
events.description: Indicates a return request was denied due to policy violations or other reasons.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Signifies the successful approval of a return request.

events.name: ReturnShipped
events.description: Indicates that the return shipment was dispatched, essential for tracking return logistics.

events.name: RefundProcessed
events.description: Tracks the status of the refund processing for a returned item.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Captured at the start of the return process, signifying that a return has been requested by the customer.

commands.name: RejectReturn
commands.description: Indicates a return request was denied due to policy violations or other reasons.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Signifies the successful approval of a return request.

commands.name: ShipReturn
commands.description: Indicates that the return shipment was dispatched, essential for tracking return logistics.

commands.name: ProcessRefund
commands.description: Tracks the status of the refund processing for a returned item.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentGatewayIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration necessary for processing refunds back to the customer.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagementIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Required for adjusting inventory levels after a return is processed.
